item.title: Git for Kids
item.description: Git More and more Markdown and Git are appearing outside the developer community. Markdown is easy to learn by design, but Git is only understandable once the idea behind it has become clear and you have learned your options for the most common use cases. There are now many convenient tools for this purpose, but without knowing the basic principle, it remains hokey. Learn Git Therefore the idea was born to create a learning circle that deals with the topic “Git learning”.
